name: Exotica
description: Emerged in the early 1950s as the United States developed a fascination with Polynesia and the South Pacific, incorporates traditional instruments and rhythms from these cultures into a Western Pop context.

children.name: Sitarsploitation
children.description: Variant of Exotica capitalising on the surge of Western interest in Indian music in the late 1960s; featured melodies played on the sitar (or instruments imitating it) atop Easy Listening accompaniment.
